column4: Everytime I try to run `apt-get update` unable to connect to server errors. I can ping both security.ubuntu.com and us.archive.ubuntu.com on the machine in question.
Why would I be able to ping it but apt-get update fails.
no idea, figured you were running an outdated version
nopt. Says it is not available, not referred or missing or obsoleted.
if I cant run 'apt-get update' i wont have a up to date list of packages i can install
weird. soo... what did you do to repositories?
do you have physical access to the machine?
you might have some firewall blocking access
as I said, I can reach the host by ping.
ok? ping isn't the same thing
